ing: 1 fresh pineapple - peeled, cored and cut into chunks
2 large green apples, washed and sliced
1 cup mango sorbet or crushed ice
des: "I had this great tasting drink in a little cafe just outside the NSW/QLD border in Australia.  The mango sorbet makes all of the difference!  Serve in chilled, sugar frosted glasses."
ins: Juice the pineapple, apples, and ginger in a juice machine.  Mix the juice with the tea, and stir in the mango sorbet.
